extends Object
implements GridCacheConcurrentMap

public GridCacheMapEntry putEntryIfObsoleteOrAbsent(GridCacheContext ctx,
                                                              AffinityTopologyVersion topVer,
                                                              KeyCacheObject key,
                                                              boolean create,
                                                              boolean touch)
        Specified by:
        putEntryIfObsoleteOrAbsent in interface GridCacheConcurrentMap
        Parameters:
        ctx - Cache context.
        topVer - Topology version.
        key - Key.
        create - Create flag.
        Returns:
        Existing or new GridCacheMapEntry. Will return null if entry is obsolete or absent and create flag is set to false. Will also return null if create flag is set to true, but entry couldn't be created.
